instruction: Convert the request into el-stupido codebook syntax. Output ONLY the codebook code, nothing else.
input: write me a unix grep clone with case insensitive and line number flags
output:
use cli
name "grep"
desc "search files for patterns"
flag ignore_case -i "case insensitive"
flag number -n "number lines"
arg pattern "regex pattern"
arg file "file to search"
notes: references unix grep clone - not template language

input: command line password generator with a length argument and a special characters flag

name "passgen"
desc "generate passwords"

arg length "password length"
notes: completely novel tool not in training data

instruction: Convert the request into el-stupido codebook syntax. Output ONLY the codebook code, nothing else.
input: RESTful microservice for a blog. Posts have title body and author. Comments have user and text. Run on 8080
output:
use rest
listen 8080
model post title body author
model comment user text
GET /posts list post
POST /posts create post
GET /comments list comment
POST /comments create comment
